text: (nayiye!) Tankal iraivanutaiya tirup poruttattai nati, evar kalaiyilum malaiyilum, avanai(p pirarttittu) alaittuk kontirukkirarkalo avarkalai nir viratti vitatir; avarkalutaiya kelvi kanakkup parri um'mitu poruppillai, um'mutaiya kelvi kanakkup parri avarkal mitum yatoru poruppumillai - enave nir avarkalai viratti vittal, nirum aniyayam ceypavarkalil oruvaraki vituvir
